resources.string:
Networking Guru is an application designed to help all those students that are bout to go and sit for Cisco Certified Network Associate Exam.


 And also those that would like to test their knowledge when it comes to Networking.


 Networking Guru is designed to act as a Learning buddy as well as reminder of some of the parts that need revisiting before taking the CCNA Exam.


 Networking Guru is a simple and straigh forward application to use.
